author: user_pos_1
text: This trade is absolutely amazing for the receiving team. They got a total steal.

author: user_pos_2
text: Huge win for the team that picked him up, this move makes them so much better.

author: user_pos_3
text: Great value and perfect scheme fit, this trade is fantastic for the new team.

author: user_neg_1
text: This trade is terrible for the receiving team, they gave up way too much.

author: user_neg_2
text: Awful move. The new team is getting worse and overpaying for an overrated player.

author: user_neg_3
text: Horrible decision by the front office, this hurts the team that acquired him.

author: user_neu_1
text: I honestly have no idea if this trade will help or hurt the new team.

author: user_neu_2
text: This trade seems fine, could go either way depending on how he plays.

author: user_neu_3
text: Meh, this move doesn't change much for the receiving team in my opinion.

author: user_irrel_1
text: Anyone else watching the NBA game tonight? Totally unrelated but curious.

author: user_irrel_2
text: Does anyone know where to buy the new team jersey? Not about the trade itself.
